title: Dedication of the Wall
summary: A list of priests and Levites is recorded. The newly rebuilt wall is dedicated with a grand celebration, including choirs, music, and thanksgiving. Temple duties are reestablished with order and joy.

faq.question: How was the wall dedicated?
faq.answer: With music, singing, and thanksgiving as people walked on top of the wall in celebration.

faq.question: What was the mood of the dedication?
faq.answer: It was joyful, with great rejoicing heard far away.
